title: Best of The Herd: 03/07/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 03/07/2019
description:
Colin thinks LeBron passing MJ on the all-time scoring list was a dud of a moment because LeBron has built no equity in Los Angeles.  He thinks Antonio Brown better enjoy these moments in the spotlight because once he's traded he will disappear.  Fox NFL Analyst Peter Schrager tells Colin why Kyler Murray will be the number one pick.  Plus, Blazers Center Enes Kanter talks about why he didn't want to join the Lakers and what it was like being trapped in an elevator with almost his entire team.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
